channel.title: Re-write the saving mechanism
channel.description: anyone have a tutorial on how to re-write the saving mechanism on 700+ servers as i HATE .p file with its shitty serialized crap

item.title: Re-write the saving mechanism
item.dc:creator: @Yourserver Yourserver
item.description:
@Yourserver wrote:

Arcik:

The serialized is good, why do you want to change it? If you want to edit char files you could program an app for it or do it within the server and like use commands or something if you want.

an appp like for my android phone as i saw that before but the guy took it down i would love a app to control it when im not around my comp

any idea how to make one???

Read full topic

[quote=“mrnessie, post:7, topic:526158”]true… i kinda wanted to make a control panel for owners but im not good with c/ making control panels i might ask randqm to help me and then ask him to release it :p[/quote]robgob has a released control panel tutorial base it off of that it will give you a basic idea at that

The serialized is good, why do you want to change it? If you want to edit char files you could program an app for it or do it within the server and like use commands or something if you want.

item.title: Re-write the saving mechanism
item.dc:creator: @mrnessie mrnessie
item.description:
@mrnessie wrote:

[quote=“Yourserver, post:4, topic:526158”][quote author=Kodiak link=topic=644901.msg4338469#msg4338469 date=1374760271]
make it write to a fudgeing text document? it seriously isn’t hard. but you should leave it how it is, much more efficient

edit: after reading through your former post I’ve noticed every single one of them to have been in either: client help, server help, or server downloads. your intentions are clear; you do not want to learn java. you want to be spoon-fed. we don’t mind helping people with legitimate problems, but your just wanting your ass wiped for you. that was my rant for the day I suppose. but all in all, instead of coming to us with EVERY SINGLE error, make an attempt to actually learn something along the way, your not doing yourself any good mate
[/quote]

well sorry for trying to make use of the help section dont like it dont come in here… n i dont come here with every little error[/quote]
ignore him… hes ignorant

Read full topic
